description: One of http://anidb.net/ch6962 [Naoyuki]`s classmates and has known the boy long enough to have developed a crush on him (and join the school`s http://anidb.net/ch25694 [newspaper club] because of this). At first, she dislikes http://anidb.net/ch6961 [Kana] and excludes her from club activities, but after an eating contest where they both overeat and get sick they finally become friends.
name: Sudou Akiho
